parameters: The Self Switches Denote the Following:
A: "On" when boulder is on top of stretch-hog
"Off when boulder gets off of stretch-hog
B: "On" once number_of_boulders_on_hog is increased by one
"Off" when boulder gets off of stretch-hog, and before initialization.
If the player is trying to push the boulder left
If the player is trying to push the boulder right
If the player is trying to push the boulder down
If the player is trying to push the boulder up
only once, and then changes self-switch B so that it
doesn't continue to add 1 every time the boulder is pushed.
